thread.title: 'Gossip Girl' Alum Penn Badgley Marries Domino Kirke in Intimate Courthouse Ceremony (Photos)
thread.title_full: 'Gossip Girl' Alum Penn Badgley Marries Domino Kirke in Intimate Courthouse Ceremony (Photos)

author: toofab.com
title: 'Gossip Girl' Alum Penn Badgley Marries Domino Kirke in Intimate Courthouse Ceremony (Photos)
text:
February 27, 2017 2:03 PM 'Gossip Girl' Alum Penn Badgley Marries Domino Kirke in Intimate Courthouse Ceremony (Photos) See 'Gossip Girl' Cast - Then and Now 
Penn Badgley is a married man. 
The "Gossip Girl" alum tied the knot with Domino Kirke in an intimate ceremony surrounding by family and close friends at a Brooklyn courthouse on Monday. 
Badley's new wife Domino is the sister of "Girls" star Jemima Kirk. Domino's other sister, Lola, posted a sweet photo on Instagram confirming her newlywed sister. 
The couple met in 2014. 
"When someone gets married in a courthouse, it's really an open invitation to everyone but the beautiful bride to explore all that fashion has to offer," Lola Kirke said. "Here, I try a look simply called 'Pants,' as Cassius goes for 'That Dude from #incubus' and Jemima experiments with 'Off to Therapy!' Congratulations @dominokirke. We love you." A post shared by Lola Kirke (@lolakirke) on Feb 27, 2017 at 8:37am PST A friend of the couple also shared a sweet photo of the newlyweds at their ceremony. A post shared by Darren Will (@smileoutofhell) on Feb 27, 2017 at 11:06am PST Congrats, Lonely Boy!
